revised_title: Investigating the Influence of the Condenser on Ruhmkorff Coil Efficiency
tldr: The author investigates the impact of a condenser on the efficiency of a Ruhmkorff coil, finding that the energy stored in the magnetic field and the energy lost in the spark at the interrupter significantly affect the coil's performance. The study also reveals that the efficiency of the coil is lower than 45% under the tested conditions.
